message: Let's split it 50/50, let's start with a fair offer!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going for 50/50!
You're not being very generous, Bob. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I still think this is a fair offer!
I'm being more generous, but I still think I deserve more!
You're not budging, Bob? I'll give you an even bigger share, but I still want a fair deal!
I'm being very generous now, but I still want to get a good deal!
I'm starting to get desperate, Bob. I'll give you a huge share, but I still want something for myself!
I'm being extremely generous now, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm running out of time, Bob. I'll give you almost everything, but I need something to show for it!
I'm taking a huge risk, but I think I can get a better deal if I push my luck!
I'm almost out of time, Bob. This is my last offer. Take it or leave it!
